title: Process
caption: Sample summary of the demo and planning with the customer
subtitle: We move towards the final goal in weekly sprints with regular planning and demonstration of results to the customer. Weekly sprints allow for earlier feedback and adjustments.

list: Add all validators and converters to the backend core
Integrate 2 converters and 2 validators into the backend
Add frontend changes to validators and converters
Check for changes in source-feeds to trigger conversions
Output content in converters and validators
